Proving himself to be more than just some fanboy .And before that was Marcus 's duel against Denero 's father .Every move the latter made only served to help Marcus 's strategy .Which cultimated in him finishing off the culitst with a casual One - Hit Kill .

Fusion Dance : Denero and Meteor are forced in to doing this during the duel against his parents , proving there conviction but also hoping to gain the power to win Marcus seeming to be unable to keep a monster on the field for them had not helped matters .

Marcus 's Breaking Speech to Gretel was incredibly vicious , but you ca n't really say she did n't deserve it .Then there 's his cold blooded execution of one of the cultists .It was horrible enough to qualify him as the group 's Token Evil Teammate , but considering that the cultist was a nihilistic psycho who had tried to torture and kill Daniel ... .

And thus begins the tale of the students of East Academy .The roleplay is complete , and can be found here .Cerebus Syndrome : The introduction and the first arc are both fairly standard Yu - Gi - Oh ! fare , with rivalries and friendships developing and generally a fairly light - hearted roleplay .

Knights of Cerebus : The Cult of Apophis present a very real and significant danger to the heroes ; their appearance marks the darkening tone of the RP .Mêlée à Trois : There was a battle royale between Justin , Marcus and an NPC called Yikhezkel .

Robert was employed in the shipping and inventory control department for US Product Corp for several years .He was a United States Air Force veteran .Survivors include his sons , Walter and Joseph Denero , Fort Lauderdale , FL ; his brothers John Denero , Aiken , SC ; Richard Denero , Fultonville , Walter Denero , Athens , GA ; his sister , Paulette Brandt , Baldwinsville ; and several nieces and nephews .
